long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you often find yourself wanting to quickly share video details or thumbnails from your favorite YouTube videos? Youtube Details Grabber is here to help! With just a simple hover and click, you can copy video titles, channel details, view counts, and even the video's thumbnail to your clipboard. Easily share these details with friends, family, or colleagues in your desired platform e.g. Facebook Messenger, Twitter, etc. Plus, you can keep track of recently added videos in a visually appealing manner. Want to show support? We've even added a feature for you to donate. Make your video sharing experience effortless and efficient with this extension.
